trans-unit.source: Displays a message box that gives the user the option of suppressing further occurrences

seg-source.mrk: Displays a message box that gives the user the option of suppressing further occurrences

target.mrk: Displays a message box that gives the user the option of suppressing further occurrences

trans-unit.source: The flags that specify the contents and behavior of the message box.

seg-source.mrk: The flags that specify the contents and behavior of the message box.

target.mrk: The flags that specify the contents and behavior of the message box.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the buttons to be displayed by setting one and only one of the following flags.

seg-source.mrk: You must specify the buttons to be displayed by setting one and only one of the following flags.

target.mrk: You must specify the buttons to be displayed by setting one and only one of the following flags.

trans-unit.source: You can display an optional icon by setting one and only one of the following flags.

seg-source.mrk: You can display an optional icon by setting one and only one of the following flags.

target.mrk: You can display an optional icon by setting one and only one of the following flags.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the title of the message box.

seg-source.mrk: The string that contains the title of the message box.

target.mrk: The string that contains the title of the message box.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the message to be displayed.

seg-source.mrk: The string that contains the message to be displayed.

target.mrk: The string that contains the message to be displayed.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains a unique string value to associate with this message.

seg-source.mrk: The string that contains a unique string value to associate with this message.

target.mrk: The string that contains a unique string value to associate with this message.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The value that the function returns when the user has opted not to have the message box displayed

seg-source.mrk: The value that the function returns when the user has opted not to have the message box displayed

target.mrk: The value that the function returns when the user has opted not to have the message box displayed

trans-unit.source: again. If the user has not opted to suppress the message box, the message box is displayed and

seg-source.mrk: If the user has not opted to suppress the message box, the message box is displayed and

target.mrk: If the user has not opted to suppress the message box, the message box is displayed and

trans-unit.source: [optional] The window handle to the message box's owner.

seg-source.mrk: The window handle to the message box's owner.

target.mrk: The window handle to the message box's owner.

trans-unit.source: If the user has already chosen to suppress the message box, the function immediately returns the

seg-source.mrk: If the user has already chosen to suppress the message box, the function immediately returns the

target.mrk: If the user has already chosen to suppress the message box, the function immediately returns the

trans-unit.source: value assigned to $iDefault, otherwise, returns one of the $ID_* constants.

seg-source.mrk: value assigned to $iDefault, otherwise, returns one of the $ID_* constants.

target.mrk: value assigned to $iDefault, otherwise, returns one of the $ID_* constants.

trans-unit.source: This function records the message boxes that the user has chosen to suppress under the following registry key.

seg-source.mrk: This function records the message boxes that the user has chosen to suppress under the following registry key.

target.mrk: This function records the message boxes that the user has chosen to suppress under the following registry key.
